altername_name: Sega Classics Arcade Collection: Limited Edition
name: Sega Classics Arcade Collection (5-in-1)
overview: Sold only as a bundled game with the launch of the Mega-CDs in the UK and North America, the 5-in-1 collection added Super Monaco GP but was otherwise identical to the 4-in-1 collection. This collection includes: Columns Golden Axe Revenge of Shinobi Streets of Rage Super Monaco GP In North America, the older "4-in-1" variant came in the same box as Sherlock Holmes: Consulting Detective Vol. I, while the later "5-in-1" variant came with Ecco the Dolphin.
